en_text: dame da yo koko kara saki wa
ugomeku yami wo kizami sagasu no hikari no sora
jp_text: 蠢动的黑暗如此刻骨 在昏暗的天空下彷徨
google_translated: 蠢 下 下 下 下 下 下

en_text: I want to fly, I want to beat my wings
A red butterfly flutters around me

jp_text: クマさんケガしちゃった
昨日ね　お父さんに踏まれちゃったの
google_translated: Yesterday I was stepped on my father

en_text: But I wanna repay her for the hairpin.
jp_text: でも　ヘアピンのお返ししたい
google_translated: But I want to return hairpin

jp_text: ボクちゃん　お嬢ちゃん　こんにちは

en_text: And the first prize is this fantastic giant teddy bear!
jp_text: これはやるっきゃないよね
福引はチケット一枚に付き一回だ
google_translated: Fukuji is one ticket with one ticket

en_text: Accepting defeat is the first step toward growing up.
jp_text: 妥協を覚えたら大人への第一歩だぜ
google_translated: If you remember a compromise, it is the first step to adults

jp_text: ホントにもらっていいのか

en_text: Not like I need a stuffed toy.
jp_text: 俺ぬいぐるみなんかいらなぇし
その代わり　ちゃんと決めろよ
チャンスを生かせない人間なんて致命的だぜ　坊主
google_translated: Human who can not make a chance is fatal

jp_text: ごめんなさい　ごめんなさい

en_text: It takes real luck to lose this many times!
google_translated: I can do it three times
It is the last one more time

en_text: I'll give this stuffed toy to Yume!
jp_text: 夢にぬいぐるみ　プレゼントするんだ
google_translated: I will give a plush to dream

jp_text: ごめん　夢　こんなのしか
これでいいの　クマさんは

en_text: He might be hurt, but he's still there for me.
jp_text: 夢のクマさん　ケガしてるけどここにいるよ
google_translated: I'm wearing a dream bear, but I'm here

en_text: I'll keep it forever and ever!
